description:
A full-featured Swiss Army Knife for your brain.

The full-featured mind mapping and brainstorming app. Like a Swiss Army Knife, Xmind offers a complete toolset for thinking and creativity.
1. Optimized the display position of the label on the topic in the Grid structure.
2. Improved the reconnection experience when online mind maps get disconnected.
3. Fixed an issue where some relationship line shapes could not be used.
4. Fixed an incompatibility issue between topic content width and task display.
5. Fixed an issue where rich text formatting was lost after copying and pasting.
6. Fixed a layout overflow issue in the Tree Table when labels and images were present.
7. Fixed a layout overflow issue in the Grid structure when labels were present.
8. Fixed an issue where copying styles did not work after updating a topic style.
9. Fixed a display issue in the Custom Style interface.
10. Fixed other known issues.
